basics.name: Rayan
basics.label: Backend, DevOps Engineer
basics.summary:
I am a 26-year-old self-taught software developer based in Marseille, France. Specializing in Backend Development and DevOps, my expertise lies in designing robust server-side applications and optimizing system operations for enhanced performance, integration and reliability.

Proficient in Python as my primary language, I also have experience with Rust and Java for projects that require high performance. If you're seeking a skilled backend developer or a seasoned DevOps engineer, whether for remote collaboration or on-site services within Marseille, feel free to contact me.

summary: Created a data analysis tool to help the company's clients understand their data better.
Developed a backend system to automate data processing and analysis.
Optimized the company's data pipeline for faster and more efficient data processing.

skills.name: Python
description: Writing efficient and scalable applications and APIs.
Proficient in Django, Flask and FastAPI.
Collect, clean and analyze data using libraries like Pandas and Numpy.

skills.name: Docker
description: Containerize applications to ensure consistency across environments.
Use Docker Compose to manage multi-container applications.

skills.name: CI / CD
description: Build and deploy efficient pipelines using tools like Github actions, Ansible or Bash scripts.
Deploy applications to the cloud using AWS or Google Cloud.

skills.name: Linux
description: Proficiency in command-line tools and scripting.
Managing, configuring, and securing Linux servers for application deployment.

skills.name: Testing
description: Writing unit, integration, and functional tests to ensure code quality.
Using testing frameworks such as pytest or unittest.

projects.name: Cabmaster.fr
projects.description: Django professional website for a small company. Authentication, rate-limit, admin dashboard, legal documents etc ...

projects.name: Mini Web Server
projects.description: Implementation of a mini web server from scratch in Python. Supports GET requests, static files, and dynamic content.

projects.name: Predicting Drug Consumption
projects.description: Full stack Django Ninja / React App showcasing an interactive statistical analysis about drug consumption and personality.

projects.name: Find & Replace
projects.description: A fast and lightweight Rust CLI tool designed to search and replace multiple text pattern occurrences within files.

projects.name: Email Spam Detector
projects.description: Small machine learning project to determine wether an email is a spam or not using the random forest algorithm.

projects.name: Simple Continuous Integration
projects.description: A Python based Continuous Integration system that runs automated tests on your projects when you push on their repos. Basic UI to monitor your logs. Easy to use, easy to extend.

articles.title: [Tutoriel] Améliorez la sécurité de votre projet Django en générant une clé privée robuste.
articles.description: Apprenez comment générer une clé privée robuste pour votre projet Django, et comment l’utiliser pour sécuriser vos données sensibles.

articles.title: [Tutoriel] Supprimez entièrement Docker de votre système en toute sécurité.
articles.description: Docker est un outil puissant qui comprend plusieurs composants. Apprenez comment supprimer Docker de votre système en toute sécurité.

articles.title: James Harris Simons, un mathématicien à Wall Street.
articles.description: Zoom sur le parcours et les accomplissements du meilleur gérant de fonds de la planète, fondateur du fonds spéculatif Renaissance Technologies et de l'algorithme Medallion.

articles.title: Stablecoins & Collatéralisation.
articles.description: Explorez en profondeur le concept de stablecoins et la manière dont ils sont collatéralisés pour garantir leur stabilité et leur valeur intrinsèque.

articles.title: Qu’est ce que la MEV, ou comment les bots et les mineurs s’engraissent sur votre dos ?
articles.description: Découvrez ce qu'est la MEV dans le monde la blockchain, et comment les individus avertis en bénéficient.

articles.title: Secure your Django project by generating a strong private key
articles.description: Learn how to generate a strong private key for your Django project, and how to use it to secure your sensitive data.
